# 1882 Chicago White Stockings season

| league_place = 1st
| owner = Albert Spalding
| manager = Cap Anson
| television =
| radio =
||image=Fred Goldsmith in 1882 Chicago White Stockings Team Photo.jpg}}
The 1882 Chicago White Stockings season was the 11th season of the Chicago White Stockings franchise, the seventh in the National League and the fifth at Lakefront Park. The White Stockings won the National League championship with a record of 55â€“29, 3 games ahead of the second place Providence Grays.
